message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I can see you're serious about the product, Bob! I can meet you in the middle at $105, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm not quite there yet, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that. This is my final offer.
